thread.title: ‘Mann Ki Baat’: PM Narendra Modi begins to address 13th edition today
thread.title_full: ‘Mann Ki Baat’: PM Narendra Modi begins to address 13th edition today | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: ‘Mann Ki Baat’: PM Narendra Modi begins to address 13th edition today
text:
Other Articles Govt to hire security guards, deploy them in buses as marshals Shocker: House demolished with man still inside PM Narendra Modi lays emphasis on organ donation in 13th 'Mann Ki Baat' Prime Minister Narendra Modi will share his thoughts with the nation through his Mann Ki Baat programme on Sunday.
“#MannKiBaat at 11AM today. Looking forward interacting with you through the radio,” The Prime Minister tweeted today.
The programme would also be live-streamed on the YouTube channels of Prime Minister’s Office, Ministry of Information and Broadcasting and DD News.
Prime Minister Modi had earlier urged people to share their ideas for the programme on the MyGov Open Forum. He also invited people to share their voice messages for the programme on the toll-free number 1800-3000-7800.
 25, 2015 9:40 am
